cons: Since when I've joined I'm playing same role, fact is no one bothers about your growth. If you are in good books and have same wine/dine habits of your manager you'll have success or be ready to be daily labour and get happy with your monthly wages. You dont know when your manager has planned for your exit as headcount keeps fluctuating and if you dont hold good relationship you may be axed. There is no goto person in HR and it is not independent entity at all. You can not go with a complain to HR, as HR and your boss must be a friend. Every year 4-5 raters get good hike and good bonus and there will be almost nothing to everyone else. You require a God father if you want to be successful in RBS. As a new comer dont expect you could impress your boss because they are closed and would want you to do exactly what they tell you to do.
